title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added budget alerts documentation section explaining email notifications at 75%, 90%, and 100% thresholds.
Created reusable file for Copilot MCP limitations and integrated it into two documentation files.
Enhanced multi-line PR comment functionality by adding shift+click selection option.
Deleted 5 orphaned webhook reusable files related to sponsorship and PR threads.
Updated AI tools script to use `gh auth token` as fallback authentication method.
Added new audit log events for Actions cache retention policies and expanded budget event fields.

- Added new audit log events for Actions cache retention policies and expanded budget event fields.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added budget alerts documentation section explaining email notifications at 75%, 90%, and 100% thresholds.
- Created reusable file for Copilot MCP limitations and integrated it into two documentation files.
- Enhanced multi-line PR comment functionality by adding shift+click selection option.
- Deleted 5 orphaned webhook reusable files related to sponsorship and PR threads.
- Updated AI tools script to use `gh auth token` as fallback authentication method.
- Added new audit log events for Actions cache retention policies and expanded budget event fields.

### Title
Add budget alerts, improve Copilot docs, multi-line comments, audit logs, and tooling
